message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product that I think you'd really value. I'm offering it to you for $95. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $85 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $90.  I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate you coming down to $90, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $87.50?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I can't go any lower than $89.  This is my final offer, as I know how valuable this product is.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $88?
